home.noNotes:
No notes yet.
You can create a new note using the button at the bottom left.

priority.empty:
No priority paragraphs yet.
Add markers like "[1] " at the start or " [2]" at the end of paragraphs (with a space) to see them here.

note.noItems:
No sub-notes or leaves yet.
You can add them using the button at the bottom left.
note.noLeaves:
No leaves yet.
You can add them using the button at the bottom left.

repoHelp.title: How to Find Repository Name
repoHelp.description: Open your repository on GitHub and use the format 'username/repository-name' from the URL.

tokenHelp.title: How to Get GitHub Personal Access Token
tokenHelp.description: Follow the steps shown above to obtain your GitHub Personal Access Token. Please keep your token secure.

background.title: Custom Background Image
background.uploadFailedLeft: Failed to load left pane background
background.uploadFailedRight: Failed to load right pane background
background.resetFailedLeft: Failed to reset left pane background
background.resetFailedRight: Failed to reset right pane background

importExport.description: Export all notes as a ZIP equivalent to git clone.
importExport.gitPolicy: .git history is not included. After extracting, run git init if you need a repo.
importExport.infoFileFooter: Archive includes notes/ and metadata.json for this app.
importExport.needInitialPull: Finish the first pull before exporting
importExport.importDescription: Import from major note app exports (text structure only).
importExport.importNote: Unsupported elements will be skipped; a summary is shown after import.
importExport.importPlaceholder: Import from major note apps will be added next.
importExport.supported: Supported: Agasteer (.zip), SimpleNote (.json; .zip containing SimpleNote export)
importExport.importCloseHint: Import just ran. If you need to review the results, cancel this Pull and check the imported note first.
importExport.unsupportedFile: Unsupported file. Please select a SimpleNote export (.json or .zip containing it).
importExport.needInitialPullImport: Finish the first pull before importing.
importExport.importReportPlacement: Placement: created note "{noteName}" (SimpleNote has no folders; items are flat).
importExport.importReportUnsupported: Not migrated: pinned state, tags, deleted/trashed notes, attachments/media, creation time (only lastModified used), rich formatting.
importExport.importReportPerItemLine: - {title}: imported as plain text; skipped metadata: pinned, tags, creation time, attachments/media, rich formatting.
importExport.importReportConsole: Details (if any) are logged to the console.

about.description: We aim for "This is all I need."
about.author: Author

toast.pushFailed: Cannot save until initial pull completes
toast.needInitialPullDownload: Cannot download until the initial pull completes
toast.longBackgroundWarning: App was in background for too long. Please save unsaved changes and reload.
toast.staleAutoSave: Remote has changes from another device. Please pull first.

modal.staleEdit: Remote has newer changes. Saving will overwrite them. Continue?
modal.unsavedChanges: You have unsaved changes. Pull will overwrite them. Continue?
modal.unsavedChangesOnStartup:
Your previous edits were not saved to GitHub.
Pulling will lose them. Pull anyway?

Select 'Cancel' to keep local changes.
modal.deleteRootNote: Delete this note? Its direct sub-notes and leaves will also be deleted.
modal.deleteSubNote: Delete this sub-note? Its leaves will also be deleted.
modal.duplicateLeafDestination: A leaf with the same name already exists in the destination. Rename before moving.
modal.duplicateNoteDestination: A note with the same name already exists in the destination. Rename before moving.
modal.duplicateNoteSameLevel: A note with the same name exists in this level. Please choose a different name.
modal.duplicateLeafSameNote: A leaf with the same name exists in this note. Please choose a different name.
modal.duplicateLeafHeading: A leaf with the same name exists in this note. Use a different heading.
modal.noNestedSubNote: Cannot create a sub-note under another sub-note.
modal.needInitialPull: Operations are locked until the initial Pull completes. Please Pull from settings.

github.rateLimited: LIMIT BREAK! Please retry in ~{minutes} min
github.rateLimitedNoTime: LIMIT BREAK! Please wait and try again later
github.connectionOk: Connection OK (auth and repo access successful)

welcome.title: Thank you for your interest in Agasteer!
welcome.message1: To save your notes, GitHub configuration is required.
welcome.message2: Please set up your repository and token in settings.
